backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing Wall of Fame entries with add, list, and auto-increment ID generation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key functionality of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind CSS variables and dark theme tokens plus global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level phase controller switching between intro, game, outro, and hall-of-fame views.
frontend/src/components/WallOfFameLink.t: Floating button component linking to the Wall of Fame screen.
frontend/src/content/story.ts: Structured story steps defining intro narrative, Barnabus sequence, slider question, and pre‑game text.
frontend/src/features/game/CollectiblesH: HUD showing collected vs total star count using an amber star icon.
frontend/src/features/game/GameView.tsx: Main game component handling canvas rendering, movement, collectibles, modals, audio, and camera logic.
frontend/src/features/game/GoalsModal.ts: Modal explaining Barnabus’s goals and dismissible via Escape or a Continue button.
frontend/src/features/game/jokes.ts: Exports a list of short goal-themed joke strings.
frontend/src/features/game/MobilePhoneMo: Empty placeholder file for a mobile phone modal.
frontend/src/features/game/passability.t: Utilities for computing guaranteed traversable channels in corridor segments and detecting obstacle intersections.
frontend/src/features/game/SpeechBalloon: Renders a clamped speech balloon above the character with tail alignment and fade-in animation.
frontend/src/features/game/StarPickupMod: A modal component showing star pickup info with optional completion message and escape-to-dismiss behavior.
frontend/src/features/game/useGameLoop.t: React hook implementing a requestAnimationFrame game loop that calls an onUpdate callback with delta time.
frontend/src/features/game/useGameplayAu: Hook managing background music and a star-collection sound with timed music pausing and resuming.
frontend/src/features/game/useKeyboardCo: Hook handling arrow-key movement, space actions, and joke triggers with disable support.
frontend/src/features/game/worldMap.ts: Generates a randomized corridor-style world map with segments, corridor checks, and obstacle utilities.
frontend/src/features/hall-of-fame/certi: Creates and downloads a minimal PDF certificate using basic text rendering and a sanitized filename.
frontend/src/features/hall-of-fame/HallO: Displays the Wall of Fame entries, highlights the current player, and provides certificate download functionality.
frontend/src/features/hall-of-fame/sanit: Transforms a name into a safe filename by replacing invalid characters with underscores and enforcing defaults.
frontend/src/features/intro/GoalStickine: Renders a slider-based question with feedback and a delayed continue button in the intro flow.
frontend/src/features/intro/introBackgro: Generates animated intro gradients based on darkening steps and provides final gradient constants.
frontend/src/features/intro/IntroFlow.ts: Manages the multi-stage intro sequence with timed text reveals, gradient transitions, and navigation to later steps.
frontend/src/features/outro/NameSubmissi: Modal for entering and submitting a player's name with validation, errors, and skip handling.
frontend/src/features/outro/OutroFlow.ts: Controls the outro sequence with timed text blocks, takeaway selection, gradient lightening, and name submission flow.
frontend/src/features/outro/TakeawayModa: Modal component that displays takeaway content based on a title and handles close events, including Escape key support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth-client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistentPlayerId: Hook that persists a bigint player ID to localStorage and provides helpers to set or clear it.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and adding Wall of Fame entries through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables, animations, and utility classes for theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling custom colors, typography, animations, and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks project state version and summarizes completed intro-to-game flow work, plus lists detailed existing features for narrative sequencing, gating, animations, background transitions, and interactive steps.
